caption: A fast punk rock anthem with distorted power chords, aggressive drumming, and raw shouted vocals. The production is deliberately lo-fi with maximum energy, featuring gang vocals on the chorus and a rebellious anti-establishment message.
lyrics:
[Intro]

One two three four!

[Verse 1]
They tell us what to think and say
Try to control us every day
But we won't be their puppets anymore
We're breaking down the door

[Chorus]
We won't conform! We won't obey!
We're gonna do it our own way!
No more lies! No more chains!
We're taking back our lives again!

[Verse 2]
Suit and tie they sell their souls
Empty promises and empty goals
But we see through their disguise
Time to open up your eyes

[Chorus]
We won't conform! We won't obey!
We're gonna do it our own way!
No more lies! No more chains!
We're taking back our lives again!

[Bridge]

Stand up! Fight back!
Stand up! Fight back!

[Verse 3]
This is our generation's call
United we will never fall
Raise your fist into the air
Show them that we're everywhere

[Final Chorus]
We won't conform! We won't obey!
We're gonna do it our own way!
No more lies! No more chains!
We're taking back our lives!

[Outro]
Oi! Oi! Oi!
